text: How to instantiate a class in python
So, I'm trying to learn Python.
It seems pretty easy, but evidently, I don't understand how classes are used.
The following code gives me an error when I try to use the class.

code:
class mystuff:
        def average(a,b,c): #get the average of three numbers
                result=a+b+c
                result=result/3
                return result

#now use the function average from the mystuff class
print mystuff.average(9,18,27)


File "class.py", line 7, in <module>
    print mystuff.average(9,18,27)
TypeError: unbound method average() must be called with mystuff instance as first argument (got int instance instead)
